title: U.S. opinion poll : sexiest musical instrument 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
There is a difference of 21.0 between the maximum Response Guitar and minimum Response Flute.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
There is a difference of 21.0 between the maximum Response Guitar and minimum Response Flute.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Guitar and lowest at Response Flute.
Response Saxophone has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 21.0 between the maximum Response Guitar and minimum Response Flute.
The Response Guitar has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Saxophone, and Piano. Down to the Response Flute which is the lowest.
The highest value 26.0 at Guitar is almost 1.59 times larger than the average value 16.33.
The Share of respondents is 98.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
